name: A VR Game About Magic, and Ducks in Cosplay
name_original: A VR Game About Magic, and Ducks in Cosplay
description:
Get your VR headset ready - draw sigils, cast magic, and help some cosplaying ducks set up for a summer festival!

My submission for the "I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again)" game jam.

Controls

ActionLeft Hand
Right Hand
ANext sentence / start conversation
Next sentence / start conversationBOpen Book (shows text log, available spells).
Skip Dialog.
Open magic circle.
Grip
Draw Sigil.
Channel active spell.
JoystickSmooth locomotion
Snap turn

Casting Magic:

  1. Open the magic circle with your right hand (B button)
  2. Draw the sigil of the spell that you want to cast, with the grip button.

You can find a list of spell sigils by opening the magic book with your left hand (B button)
